LanguageData.VFE_FactoryFloor.label: заводська підлога
LanguageData.VFE_FactoryFloor.description: Reinforced steel tiles, capable of holding heavy, complex machinery in place. Not the prettiest to look at.
LanguageData.VFE_FactoryPath.label: заводська доріжка
LanguageData.VFE_FactoryPath.description: A designated, safe to traverse factory path. Increases the movement speed, but needs to be placed on the factory floor.
